column5: Hey guys . It seems we have a new member that joined today and his first post is in buy sell section of boats and motors. His name BEHIGRU, his add is a cover for lots of spam. I had trouble getting out of it. Please check it out
Yep...it's nothing but a redirection to search engines....get rid of it!!!  Mods...please use the powers vested in you to protect the members of this board of the ever hated and evil SPAM!!!!!
That's what the report icon is for sirfish...direct report to Mods. Not the first spammer in the same forum category in the last week.
No probs irish, didn't know what that icon was for now i do.
